title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the date on the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a calendar date picker will pop up on the screen
showing the current month
and arrows to the left and right of the month
and today's date highlighted
and each date will have the number of games scheduled for that day
and there will be two options underneath the calendar: "Cancel" "Go To Today"
will take the user to today's date on the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: Tapping on any day in that specific month
custom_steps_separated.expected: will take the user to that specific date on the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
Tapping on any greyed out day
(days before and after current month)
custom_steps_separated.expected: will take the user to that specific date on the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: Tapping on the left and right month arrows
custom_steps_separated.expected: will take the user to either the previous month (left) or the next month (right)

title: Dates with No Scheduled Games
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device

custom_steps_separated.content:
If the user taps on the calendar date picker
and there are dates in that month with no scheduled games
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the date should not show a number (no zero)
and should be blank

custom_steps_separated.content:
If the user taps on dates within the date range of the season that have no scheduled games
(i.e. days before and after All Star Game)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the date should be tappable and should bring the user to that date
(check both Scoreboard and EPG)

custom_steps_separated.content:
If the user taps on dates outside of the date range of the season
(i.e. days in February and November)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then tapping the date should not produce a response and the user should remain on the date picker

title: Device Orientation
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the device is in Portrait
and the user taps on the calendar date picker
and then rotates the device to Landscape

(check for both Scoreboard and .TV EPG)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the date picker will remain on the screen
and all buttons on the picker should function correctly
(month arrows, other dates in the month, Cancel, Go To Today)

(check all buttons)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the device is in Landscape
and the user taps on the calendar date picker
and then rotates the device to Portrait

(check for both Scoreboard and .TV EPG)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the date picker will remain on the screen
and all buttons on the picker should function correctly
(month arrows, other dates in the month, Cancel, Go To Today)

(check all buttons)
